It is unclear whether "any portion of the software" assumes code changes and additions that also must be distributed "only under this license". In addition, a "license that complies with this license" may or may not be interpreted as a copyleft clause. If not, the copyleft condition would depend on the mode of delivery which would require a case-by-case assessment. Therefore, a general recommendation on the compatibility of the MS-PL license can only be given for selected cases. Interpretation: It is unclear whether "any portion of the software" assumes code changes and additions that also must be distributed "only under this license". In addition, a "license that complies with this license" may or may not be interpreted as a copyleft clause. If not, the copyleft condition would depend on the mode of delivery which would require a case-by-case assessment.
